sql-select.name: GetInstanceDatabaseIOStatusMonth
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUName] ,strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,'#080808' AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,date(MIN(t.[EventDay]),'start of month') AS [EventDayMin] ,date(MIN(t.[EventDay]),'start of month','+1 month','-1 day') AS [EventDayMax] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceDatabaseIOStatus] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] hSID ON hSID.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstanceDatabase_id] INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE t.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(t.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_InstanceDatabaseIOStatus] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] hSID ON hSID.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstanceDatabase_id] INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id ) GROUP BY strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) ORDER BY strftime('%Y%m', t.[EventDay]) DESC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceDatabaseIOStatusDays
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT strftime('%Y%m%d', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUName] ,strftime('%Y%m%d', t.[EventDay]) AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,CASE WHEN (strftime('%w', t.[EventDay]) = '0') THEN '#CC0000' ELSE '#080808' END AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,MIN(t.[EventDay]) AS [EventDayMin] ,MAX(t.[EventDay]) AS [EventDayMax] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceDatabaseIOStatus] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] hSID ON hSID.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstanceDatabase_id] INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE t.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) GROUP BY strftime('%Y%m%d', t.[EventDay]) ORDER BY strftime('%Y%m%d', t.[EventDay]) DESC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceDatabaseIOStatus
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT t.[EventTime] AS [EventTime] ,hSID.[DatabaseName] AS [DatabaseName] ,t.[num_of_reads] AS [num_of_reads] ,t.[num_of_bytes_read] AS [num_of_bytes_read] ,t.[io_stall_read_ms] AS [io_stall_read_ms] ,t.[num_of_writes] AS [num_of_writes] ,t.[num_of_bytes_written] AS [num_of_bytes_written] ,t.[io_stall_write_ms] AS [io_stall_write_ms] ,t.[io_stall] AS [io_stall] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceDatabaseIOStatus] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] hSID ON hSID.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstanceDatabase_id] INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE hSID.[DatabaseName] = IFNULL(@DatabaseName, hSID.[DatabaseName]) AND CASE WHEN ((@EventDayMin IS NOT NULL) AND (@EventDayMax IS NOT NULL)) THEN t.[EventDay] BETWEEN date(@EventDayMin) AND date(@EventDayMax) WHEN (@strDateTimeModifier IS NOT NULL) THEN t.[EventTime] > ( SELECT DATETIME(MAX(t.[EventTime]), @strDateTimeModifier) FROM [hist].[h_InstanceDatabaseIOStatus] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstanceDatabase] hSID ON hSID.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstanceDatabase_id] INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = hSID.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE hSID.[DatabaseName] = IFNULL(@DatabaseName, hSID.[DatabaseName]) ) ELSE t.[EventDay] = date('1900-01-01') END ORDER BY t.[EventTime] ASC ;
